subject: Re: Help with a Movie title

Hi!
   Can you understand Japanese and do you have (or have access to) a 
region 2 DVD player?  If so, I may be able to find it in Japan.
     Just let me know,
            av98us    
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Scott <scottc_4@h...>" 
<scottc_4@h...> wrote:
> Awhile back I saw a movie that I saw was entitled Heaven and 
> Earth on TV.  Basically, and breifly it is a fairly recent samurai 
> movie that is in part based on the struggles between Takeda 
> Shingen and Uesugi Kenshin.  I taped it, and really enjoy it.  I 
am 
> now looking for it on DVD, but cannot find it under Heaven and 
> Earth, all I get is the Oliver Stone one.  I remeber a while back 
on 
> here someone metioning it by a different title.  If anyone knows 
it 
> please help.  Thanks
